title: The Meaning of Life is Money

fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: Upon landing here, a player may spend $2500 to win immediately and leave the game, willing all their properties and money to other players. This space then transforms into another one of the host's choosing and the game continues, seeking out another winner (that being the last player standing). If the player really wants to be mean or play monopoly more, they can choose to stay in the game and try to win the normal way too (they will still have won the game if they paid).
